name: CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade
description:
NOTE: the x64 ZIP is the Windows version.

WELCOME TO CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade's Overview and Download page!

Dodge obstacles as you play through this very fun 3D Racer!

the game updates regularly so be sure to come back every 2 weeks on Tuesday 3:45P.M. EST for the latest news! 

Thank you so much for waiting! CUBE-A-THON: Renamed and Remade is now available for MacOS (Silicon and Intel) and Linux! 

Good Luck and Have Fun!

the icon is grey, ill fix that when the other platforms come out later.
